segments.text: I ’ m a bit worried about you going shopping by yourself this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh don ’ t worry , I ’ ll be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But what will you do if you need to know the price of something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I need to know the price , I ’ ll just look at the label .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , but what will you do if you want to check the size of the clothes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what will you do if you don ’ t have enough cash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I ’ ll just use my credit card .
segments.speaker: S2
